item.title: A pure market maker algorithm
item.description: Introduction A tutorial to develop a Telegram chatbot for data-driven analytics of cryptoassets from both utility and speculation perspectives. Telegram chatbot: https://t.me/trading_analysis_bot GitHub repository: https://github.com/trinhvv/trading-analysis-bot (>100 star) Technology Chatbot Financial time series data visualization and analysis Databases and access management Data wrangling Requirements python-telegram-bot python-binance numpy datetime matplotlib seaborn six pandas sqlalchemy psycopg2 beautifulsoup4 requests Source code import os import telegram from telegram import ParseMode from telegram.
